articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Reliance Power Q2 Results: Net loss narrows to ₹237 crore on higher revenue, income up 9.5% YoY | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Reliance Power Q2 Results: Total income rose to  ₹2,130.83 crore during the quarter, from  ₹1,945.14 crore last year.
articles.content: Reliance Power's consolidated net loss narrowed to 237.76 crore in the September quarter due to higher revenues, the company said in a BSE filing on Tuesday.
